mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Hicks, William A.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Ripley, Brown Co., Ohio [Ripley, Brown County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Hicks, William A. Patient Age: 18. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left leg . Location Wounded: In action at Lynchburg, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/06/18. Nature of Wound: Grape Shot. Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
